bibl.title: Documents from the Ptolemaic Period in the Helsinki University Collections.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Frösén, Jaakko

bibl.note: Rapport concernant un lot de 37 papyrus acquis en 1978 et provenant des cartonnages de deux momies. - I. Nos 1-3. Nome Arsinoïte, IIIe siècle avant J.-C. - II. Nos 4-37. Nome Héracléopolite, IIe siècle avant J.-C.
Frösén Jaakko, Documents from the Ptolemaic Period in the Helsinki University Collections.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 227-280.
